16 class V_COREEXPORT Meta {
17  public:
18  Meta(int block=-1, int timestep=-1, int animationstep=-1, int iteration=-1, int execcount=-1, int creator=-1);
19  int block() const { return m_block; }
20  void setBlock(int block) { m_block = block; }
21  int numBlocks() const { return m_numBlocks; }
22  void setNumBlocks(int num) { m_numBlocks = num; }
23  double realTime() const { return m_realtime; }
24  void setRealTime(double time) { m_realtime = time; }
25  int timeStep() const { return m_timestep; }
26  void setTimeStep(int timestep) { m_timestep = timestep; }
27  int numTimesteps() const { return m_numTimesteps; }
28  void setNumTimesteps(int num) { m_numTimesteps = num; }
29  int animationStep() const { return m_animationstep; }
30  void setAnimationStep(int step) { m_animationstep = step; }
31  void setNumAnimationSteps(int step) { m_numAnimationsteps = step; }
32  int numAnimationSteps() const { return m_numAnimationsteps; }
33  int iteration() const { return m_iteration; }
34  void setIteration(int iteration) { m_iteration = iteration; }
35  int executionCounter() const { return m_executionCount; }
36  void setExecutionCounter(int count) { m_executionCount = count; }
37  int creator() const { return m_creator; }
38  void setCreator(int id) { m_creator = id; }
39  Matrix4 transform() const;
40  void setTransform(const Matrix4 &transform);
41

43  int m_block, m_numBlocks, m_timestep, m_numTimesteps, m_animationstep, m_numAnimationsteps, m_iteration, m_executionCount, m_creator;
44  double m_realtime;
